programme.desc: Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan / Pups Save A Turbot Tournament - Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan to steal the spotlight from the Cat Pack. // The pups must save Granny Tilly when an impromptu Turbot Tournament gets overly competitive.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Good Mayor - Mayor Goodway goes missing and Mayor Humdinger causes havoc in Adventure Bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep206
programme.desc: The Crew Builds a Gym / The Crew Puts On a Construction Show - Coach Karima asks Rubble & Crew to build a gym for the gymnastics show. But when the beam is too high for Lily, it's up to the pups to save the day.//When a traveling show can't get to Builder Cove, Rubble & Crew decides to build a show of their own!

programme.title: Dora S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Tio Tesoro's Treasure - Dora, Boots, and Map help To Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again.

programme.title: Dora S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Chompy and the Cloud Flower - Dora and Boots help Chompy find another Cloud Flower Seed after he accidentally eats Isa's.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure - Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Hamsters of Hamsterdale S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Greg the Brave / Hide and Squeak! - Greg pretends to be injured to avoid having to do a scary trick for his friends. // During a game of hide and seek, Lil Pal hides so well she can't be found.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep113
programme.desc: Zeg and the Egg - Zeg is out smashing things with Blaze and AJ when he finds a tiny dinosaur egg. Now the three friends must embark on an epic journey across a prehistoric landscape to return the egg to its Truckodactyl mother.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep509
programme.desc: The Great Space Race - Blaze and AJ take off into space for a race that's out of this world! Along the way to Planet Victory, they meet friendly aliens, dodge asteroids, and face off against Crusher's space ship!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Pup A Doodle Do - Mayor Goodways purse chicken Chickaletta has gone missing. Ryder and the Paw Patrol search Adventure bay.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite - The Crew helps with a parking problem when Caf Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Dora S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Great Key Mystery - Dora and Boots investigate a mysterious key so they can discover more about Dora's great-great grandma, the first exploradora.

programme.title: Dora S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Tio Tesoro's Treasure - Dora, Boots, and Map help To Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again.

programme.title: Ib the Dog S3 Ep306
programme.desc: Ib goes for a nice long walk - Mouse wants to go for a long walk, but Ib's not too sure until he finds out Mouse has a special destination in mind.

programme.title: Ib the Dog S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Ib hears a sound from a thicket - Ib is out for a walk, when he hears a knocking sound coming from a thicket.

programme.title: Ib the Dog S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Ib fixes a bike bell - Ib is out for a bike ride when he runs into Goose who's having some trouble with a broken bike-bell.

programme.title: Ib the Dog S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Ib needs fresh air - Ib is bored and the house feels stuffy, so Mouse helps him get some fresh air.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep211
programme.desc: Working Like a Sharkdog - All Sharkdog wants to do is play with his new toy, but when Dad ends up on a wild adventure through town, Sharkdog must give up his playtime and come to Dad's rescue.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Sharkdog's Got Talent - Sharkdog wants to perform in the talent show with Max, but all Max wants to do is chill. Will Sharkdog perform with one of Max's friends instead?

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep207
programme.desc: Ice Cream / Pasta & Sauce - When Bonzo doesn't get any of Chef's homemade ice cream, Chef tries to make more with his hand-crank ice cream maker. // Chef and Olly just made fresh pasta, so they make Brody Bambino's slow-roasted sauce to go with it - emphasis on the slow!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Making Bread / From One Pit to Another - Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep708
programme.desc: Mission to Mars - NASA's Commander Megan is back! And she's taking Blaze and his friends to... Mars! But when Crusher accidently detaches the rocket ship's thrusters, it's up to Mars Rover Blaze to navigate Mars and get those thrusters back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep709
programme.desc: Renewable Energy Racers - Blaze and his friends have renewable energy engines! And when the Gas Guzzler steals everyone's gas, they'll have to use renewable energy to finish the race!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep215
programme.desc: Pups Save a Friend / Pups Save a Stowaway - When Marshall decides to take a break from the PAW Patrol, the pups jump into action to bring him back! // When the pups find a stowaway on their trip to the Icy Tundra, they must rescue a run-away kitty on a run-away Snow Cat!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Pups' Adventures in Babysitting / Pups Save the Fireworks - Mayor Goodway calls on the Paw Patrol to rescue her twin niece and nephew from a tree, and then twin sit for the day! // Expecting the fireworks for Adventure Bay Day, Mayor Goodway receives a package of piglets after a mix-up!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep311
programme.desc: Paddington's Puffling Rescue / Paddington Goes Under The Sea - Paddington and the Browns rescue pufflings who, instead of taking their firs flight, get lost around the campsite // Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonatahn and Judy - but where is Judy's necklace?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep212
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Ballpark / The Crew Builds A Surf Bridge - When Rubble's favorite baseball star Aaron Judge can't get out of town to the home run derby, Rubble & Crew build a stadium to hold the derby right in Builder Cove! // Surf's up for Rubble & Crew! Well, if they can get over the super hot sand, it is.

programme.title: Dora S2 Ep213
programme.desc: The Great Key Mystery - Dora and Boots investigate a mysterious key so they can discover more about Dora's great-great grandma, the first exploradora.

programme.title: Dora S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Tio Tesoro's Treasure - Dora, Boots, and Map help To Tesoro find his treasure trackers and become a treasure map again.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep710
programme.desc: The Baby Robot From Outer Space - Special Mission Blaze is on the case! When the Baby Robot from Outer Space turns everyone into babies, it's up to Blaze and his new Special Mission Modes to save the day! Can he rescue his friends, or will he be the next baby on the block?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S2 Ep210
programme.desc: Avocado Sushi / Poi - Chef is so focused on his avocado's perfect ripeness that he ignores the rest of his avocado sushi recipe. // Chef's friend inspires him to bring Hawai'i home by making poi and decorating the Stump-staycation style.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Sherman in the Middle / Smoothie Day - Hank becomes frustrated when he has to share his father's time with his new stepsisters. // As the squiddos prepare for Smoothie Day, William makes a new friend whose jokes are more hurtful than funny.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep202
programme.desc: No Fishes in This School - It's the first day of school, and Sharkdog's not allowed to come; well, that's never stopped him before!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep203
programme.desc: Going Wild - When Sharkdog's wild side keeps scaring away the dogs at the dog park, Sharkdog must find his inner calm if he wants to make new friends.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep204
programme.desc: A Not So Grand Opening - When Sharkdog accidentally eats the aquarium's newest exhibit, Max and the Sharkpack must come up with a plan before Mr. Ceviche, the aquarium's owner, catches on.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep205
programme.desc: The Fast and The Fishy - Max is determined to win this year's obstacle course race, but that may be difficult with Sharkdog always trying to help.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 Ep1022
programme.desc: Pups Save a Talkative Mini Patrol / Pups Save the History of Adventure Bay - Alex dreams that his Mini Patrol animals can talk as they take the Bookmobile on a wild adventure! // Mayor Humdinger steals "The History of Adventure Bay," the book falls apart, and It's up to the Paw Patrol to retrieve it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 Ep207
programme.desc: The Crew Builds Charger a Super Bed / The Crew Builds a Super Squirrely Whirly Playground - Charger has a problem... he's got too much energy to sleep! Lucky for him, Rubble & Crew knows there's always a construction solution. // Rubble and the pups build Mix, Motor, Lucas, and Lily the coolest Super Squirrely Whirly playdate ever!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep99
programme.desc: Running Around in Circles - Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po run around in circles in Home Dome. The Noo-Noo joins in and the Teletubbies have fun chasing.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S2 Ep18
programme.desc: Key - Dee encourages a friend to say 'key' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a silver key, a locking key, a car key and a castle key. There's even a magic key!

programme.desc: Farmyard Runaways - Plom is looking after some new furry friends, specifically a heard of Alpacas. But when the Poppacas end up wandering off into the unknown, Plom has to find a way to get them back.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Sheep Dog - Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Housework - Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep6
programme.desc: The Why Badge - Why do my feet hurt?', Tag asks Duggee. While Duggee has a think, he tells them 'why' is a great question, and the Squirrels are quick to follow up.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep5
programme.desc: The Mime Badge - Duggee is encouraging the Squirrels to come outside by gesturing through the window. They don't understand what he's doing and think it's funny. When he comes inside, he explains that he was miming.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep4
programme.desc: The Talent Badge - Out for a walk, the Squirrels spot an interesting poster - it's King Tiger advertising his Roar Talent Show. Naturally, the Squirrels are very keen to take part.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Jigokudani Monkey Park, Japan - The Go Jetters fly to the rescue in Japan, as Glitch gets up to his usual monkey business.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep47

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Hairdressers - During a game of hairdressers, Bluey discovers that big-headed customer Dad has nits! To help treat them Bingo has to find her voice, while Bluey has to find her ears.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Andy and the Amazon Cichlid - Andy takes to the skies in his safari-mobile, jetting off to the Amazon River in Brazil in search of a rare cichlid fish. Along the way, he has a run in with a hungry stingray.

programme.desc: The A Cappella Badge - The Squirrels are inspired to learn how to sing a cappella style.

programme.desc: Black History Month - UFC Unleashed is celebrating Black History Month with a look at some of 2022s most exciting fights to come from our roster of black athletes. Featuring Joaquin Buckley, Jared Cannonier, Chris Barnett, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC283TeixeiravsHill
programme.desc: At UFC 283, former champion Glover Teixiera and Jamahal Sweet Dreams Hill squared off for the vacant light heavyweight belt. See both men train and prepare ahead of their championship bout on UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep603LockedInWMMADecadeUnbreakableZhangWeiliFighterFocusPolyanaVianaDayOneMayceeBarber
programme.desc: We celebrate a decade of Women in the UFC by looking back at the fighters and moments that make up this decorated history. We dive into the relationship between Zhang Weili and Cai Xuejun and discover how they built Weilis impressive career, crowning her the first-ever Chinese champion in UFC history. Polyana Viana shares her love of fan fiction outside of the Octagon at a cosplay convention. Maycee Barber looks back at her UFC debut in Day One.

programme.title: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY
programme.desc: LIGUE 1 TOP 10 COLLECTIVE PLAY - Nothing more satisfying than a flowing team move with the finish. 10 of the best plays from 22/23.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC 310: Pantoja vs. Asakura
programme.desc: Prelims - In the midst of an increasingly dominant reign atop the flyweight division, Alexandre Pantoja will put his belt on the line for a third time in the main event of UFC 310 on December 8 against Japanese star Kai Asakura, who will look to shock the world by winning a UFC title in his first trip to the Octagon. Plus, a shot at the welterweight title will be up for grabs in the co-main event as unbeaten contenders Shavkat Rakhmonov and Ian Machado Garry collide at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.

programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill

Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.
